type.name: org.gradle.process.ProcessForkOptions
type.description: Specifies the options to use to fork a process.

method.name: copyTo
method.description:
Copies these options to the given target options.
param:options The target options

returns:this

method.name: environment
method.description:
Adds some environment variables to the environment for this process.
param:environmentVariables The environment variables. Must not be null.

returns:this

method.name: environment
method.description:
Adds an environment variable to the environment for this process.
param:name The name of the variable.
param:value The value for the variable. Must not be null.

returns:this

method.name: executable
method.description:
Sets the name of the executable to use.
param:executable The executable. Must not be null.

returns:this

method.name: getEnvironment
method.description:
The environment variables to use for the process. Defaults to the environment of this process.

returns:The environment. Returns an empty map when there are no environment variables.

method.name: getExecutable
method.description:
Returns the name of the executable to use.

returns:The executable.

method.name: getWorkingDir
method.description:
Returns the working directory for the process. Defaults to the project directory.

returns:The working directory. Never returns null.

method.name: setEnvironment
method.description:
Sets the environment variable to use for the process.
param:environmentVariables The environment variables. Must not be null.

method.name: setExecutable
method.description:
Sets the name of the executable to use.
param:executable The executable. Must not be null.

method.name: setWorkingDir
method.description:
Sets the working directory for the process. The supplied argument is evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object).
param:dir The working directory. Must not be null.

method.name: workingDir
method.description:
Sets the working directory for the process. The supplied argument is evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object).
param:dir The working directory. Must not be null.

returns:this

property.name: environment
property.description:
The environment variables to use for the process. Defaults to the environment of this process.

returns:The environment. Returns an empty map when there are no environment variables.

property.name: executable
property.description:
Returns the name of the executable to use.

returns:The executable.

property.name: workingDir
property.description:
Returns the working directory for the process. Defaults to the project directory.

returns:The working directory. Never returns null.
